about_the_game: FreeIntv is a libretro core for the beloved video game console from 1979, it is designed to be compatible with gamepads from the 1990 era forward even if they originally required a number pad.
detailed_description: FreeIntv is a libretro core for the beloved video game console from 1979, it is designed to be compatible with gamepads from the 1990 era forward even if they originally required a number pad.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux-based distro
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 and up (CPU with SSE2 instructions required)
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any compliant OpenGL 2.x or Direct3D11 GPU. For shaders to work properly, should support at least Shader Model 2.0.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux-based distro
  • Processor: Intel Core series or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any compliant OpenGL 2.x or Direct3D11 GPU. For shaders to work properly, should support at least Shader Model 2.0.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: RetroArch - FreeIntv

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 and up (CPU with SSE2 instructions required)
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GPU and driver that supports OpenGL v2.0 or higher
  • Additional Notes: For OpenGL: Intel HD 2K/3K GPUs on Windows 10 will have to fall back to an OpenGL 1.1 driver.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core series or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel: At least Intel HD 4K required for OpenGL, any compliant D3D11 GPU for Direct3D 11. Should support at least Shader Model 3.0 and/or 4.0.
  • Additional Notes: For OpenGL: Intel HD 2K/3K GPUs on Windows 10 will have to fall back to an OpenGL 1.1 driver.
